steps.title: Notifications
steps.detail:
We may send you periodic reminders or notifications on your phone to complete your activities.

You can choose to make it an alert, a sound, or an icon badge.

You can say no and still be in the study.

steps.title: Environmental Factors
steps.detail:
The environment around you, such as weather or air pollution in your area or how close you are to a grocery store or park, can affect your health and well-being.

On the next screens we will ask for your permission to collect a variety of data. This is optional, you can say no and still be in the study.

steps.title: Weather and Air Quality
steps.detail:
We’d like to know the weather and air quality around you.

We will only collect this data when you are using the app.

steps.title: Microphone
steps.detail:
Noise can be distracting. We’d like to use the phone microphone to record the noise level around you.

We only measure noise when you are doing the activities. We do not keep the recordings.

steps.title: Motion & Fitness Activity
steps.detail:
We’d like to measure your movements while you use the app.

This will give us an idea of your physical activity that may distract you while you are using the app.
